teetime.framework

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • teetime.framework.AbstractCompositeStage
      • teetime.framework.Configuration

  • public abstract class Configuration
extends AbstractCompositeStage
    Represents a configuration of connected stages. Available to be extended.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Christian Wulf, Nelson Tavares de Sousa

      • registerCustomPipe

        protected void registerCustomPipe(AbstractPipe<?> pipe)
        Register pipes if your configuration only relies on custom pipes and therefore AbstractCompositeStage.connectPorts(OutputPort, InputPort) is never called.
        Parameters:
        pipe - A custom pipe instance

      • connectPorts

        protected <T> void connectPorts(OutputPort<? extends T> sourcePort,
                    InputPort<T> targetPort,
                    int capacity)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCompositeStage
        Connects to ports with a pipe of a certain capacity
        Overrides:
        connectPorts in class AbstractCompositeStage
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of elements to be sent
        Parameters:
        sourcePort - OutputPort of the sending stage
        targetPort - InputPort of the sending stage
        capacity - the pipe is set to this capacity, if the value is greater than 0. If it is 0, than the pipe is unbounded, thus growing of the pipe is enabled.
